Khushhall

Hi, I am Khushhall. Dual Degree student at IIT-Bombay


About me

I am a Dual Degree student in the Electrical Engineering department at Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay. I'm broadly interested in the fields of Machine Learning, Image processing, Computer Vision, Multimodal models. Apart from my academic pursuits, I like to spend my time visiting new places, sleeping or developing any application that could help the community or just automate my work!

Round Icons

Extended the Convolutional Chair Generation model by Dosovitskiy et al. for a 3-DOF CRS Robot. Reconstruction of robot poses using joint angles and viewpoint enables us to perform local planning by checking obstacle intersection in the image space by key-point mapping. This in turn helps build the final PRM for robot path planning. Currently working on creating an example dataset of the CRS-Robot for the model.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Web Development

Round Icons

Extended the Convolutional Chair Generation model by Dosovitskiy et al. for a 3-DOF CRS Robot. Reconstruction of robot poses using joint angles and viewpoint enables us to perform local planning by checking obstacle intersection in the image space by key-point mapping. This in turn helps build the final PRM for robot path planning. Currently working on creating an example dataset of the CRS-Robot for the model.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Web Development
